/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted under the overcast sky. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades a mix of modern and traditional architecture, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. Trees dot the landscape, their leaves a vibrant splash of green against the urban backdrop. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
